nodes.text: Port Town District was an area located on the upper concourse of Cloud City. The area was not to be confused with the notorious mid-level, Port Town.

Port Town District was established by the Special Edition Limited CCG as an area of Cloud city glimsed in the special edition re-release of Star Wars: Episode V The Empire Strikes Back. As pictured, it differs greatly from the pre-established Port Town which is a mid-level industrial scale area.
